comments.steps_per_frame: Higher = more accurate but slower. 1-10 recommended.
comments.relaxation_time: tau: 0.5-1.0. Lower = less viscous. Must be > 0.5 for stability.
comments.initial_wind_speed: In lattice units. Keep < 0.1 for stability. 0.05 is gentle.
comments.max_wind_speed: Maximum slider value. Keep < 0.2 to avoid instability.
